metadata.title: CVE-2022-23638 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: svg-sanitizer is a SVG/XML sanitizer written in PHP. A cross-site scriptingvulnerability impacts all users of the `svg-sanitizer` library prior toversion 0.15.0. This issue is fixed in version 0.15.0. There is currentlyno workaround available.

criterions.comment: spip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
